subject: Marketing
title: The Buyer's Journey
description: Learn The Buyer's Journey in one minute.

hook.text: A customer doesn't wake up and buy a $10,000 mattress. The journey starts months earlier.

buildup.text: The buyer's journey moves through awareness, consideration, and decision stages.

discovery.text: Each stage needs different contentâ€”education early, comparison middle, proof late.

twist.text: Most brands create only bottom-of-funnel content and wonder why nobody converts.

climax.text: Content for every stage means capturing customers before competitors even know they exist.

punchline.text: Meet them where they are, not where you want them.

quiz.question: What are the three stages of the buyer's journey?
